attributes.action: Make animal abuse reportable on UK operating social media platforms
attributes.background: Animal abuse is prolific on social media shared by members of the public and large social media pages. Currently it is not possible to report animal abuse images/videos on many social media sites. Viral posts harm individual animals and contribute to illegal trade, causing near extinctions.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of social media companies. 

You could start a new petition asking the Government to urge social media companies to take this action.
